did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Bibliography and publications of Harold M. Mayer, including material concerning city planning, inland water transportation, urban transportation, and city and transportation planning in Chicago.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Member, International Fraternity of Lambda Alpha, Ely Chapter.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Bibliography and publications of Harold M. Mayer, including material concerning city planning, inland water transportation, urban transportation, and city and transportation planning in Chicago.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Harold M. Mayer Publications, #3526. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

odd.head: NOTES
odd.p: Part of Lambda Alpha Literary Archives.

did.unittitle: Collection consists of a single box. Online guide unavailable.
